title: What A “Tragedy”, TV Doctors Betray Us 4.13.20
itunes:title: What A “Tragedy”, TV Doctors Betray Us 4.13.20
description:
In episode 607, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Francesca Fiorentini to discuss how the Trump administration was briefed about coronavirus way before they will admit to, how TV doctors need to chill out, new horny Netflix shows, Oscar predictions, quarantine activities, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Golf, handshakes and a Mar-a-Lago conga line: Squandered week highlights Trump’s lack of COVID-19 focus
  2. White House was briefed by medical intelligence specialists about the spreading contagion in China as early as NOVEMBER - and warning about carnage in Wuhan was in Donald Trump's daily briefing in early January
  3. US Surgeon General says some parts of the country may be able to reopen on May 1 - but the majority will have to remain on strict lockdown in order to defeat coronavirus
  4. TRUMP TODAY: “We're doing a great job, as good a job as you can possibly do."
  5. Dr. Phil is not a medical doctor. But he is now a paid spokesperson for a diabetes drug.
  6. Dr. Drew Apologizes for Widely Shared Claim That Coronavirus Was ‘Press-Induced Panic’
  7. The Unholy Alliance of Trump and Dr. Oz
  8. Trump Eyes Accused ‘Quack’ Dr. Oz for Coronavirus Advice
  9. Netflix’s Too Hot to Handle Will Fill the Love Is Blind–Size Hole in Your Life
  10. Who Will Win the Oscars Next Year If No More Movies Come Out This Year?
  11. WATCH: Hailu Mergia & Dahlak Band — Wede Harer Guzo

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
